aka: Bare djevelen lever uten håp(挪威)
Nur der Teufel lebt ohne Hoffnung: Politische Gefangene in Usbekistan(德)
Only the Devil Lives Without Hope(英)
それでも私は諦めない ウズベキスタン女性の戦い(日)

writer.name: 马格努斯·格滕 Magnus Gertten
杰斯珀·奥斯蒙德 Jesper Osmund

director.name: 马格努斯·格滕 Magnus Gertten

trans_title: Bare djevelen lever uten håp(挪威)
Nur der Teufel lebt ohne Hoffnung: Politische Gefangene in Usbekistan(德)
Only the Devil Lives Without Hope(英)
それでも私は諦めない ウズベキスタン女性の戦い(日)
introduction: Dilya became a human rights activist the day her brother was thrown in prison, accused of being a terrorist. She challenged the dictatorship, escaped her home country but realized that the regime was closer than she could ever imagine.
